entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:50 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 09:11 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: E 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
